Technique: FORMED BY HAND; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Demotic ostracon
Description: This ostracon, which was purchased by J. Capart at Luxor in 1900, bears a Demotic text on four lines, written with a reed pen. It contains a receipt of tax on palm trees for year 40 of the reign of the emperor Augustus.
